title: ‘One of Most Bullish Charts I’ve Seen’ – Ex-Goldman Sachs Executive Details Ethereum Outlook As ETH Prints New Pattern - The Daily Hodl
content:
Real Vision CEO Raoul Pal says that key indicators are flashing bullish for the smart contract platform Ethereum (ETH) as the altcoin remains above the $2,000 level.

In a new analysis, the former Goldman Sachs executive says that Ethereum’s price action continues to print bullish patterns.

“The zoomed-out chart of Ethereum continues to be one of the most bullish I have seen.”

According to the macro guru, Ethereum’s market structure is closely mirroring increasing market liquidity.

“Fed net liquidity versus Ethereum: Ethereum, for example, is basically a pure play on liquidity.”

In the short term, Pal says that Ethereum is now potentially forming a bullish cup-and-handle pattern after having completed a bullish flag pattern. The investor says Ethereum will likely gain bullish steam if it closes above $2,150.

“Speaking of Ethereum, we’re currently in the process of testing very important levels. We have been highlighting the bull flag chart pattern in Ethereum – which we recently cleared – for several weeks now and it looks like we could be forming a larger cup-and-handle pattern.

A close above $2,150 would be very positive. Something to keep an eye on.”

He also says that he is long-term bullish on Ethereum after ETH broke out of a wedge pattern at the $2,087 level on the weekly chart.

“If we zoom out using weekly data, Ethereum has already broken out from its near-perfect wedge pattern; it’s a very bullish chart.”

Ethereum is trading for $2,023 at time of writing, down 2.1% in the last 24 hours.

title: A Young Millionaire Emerges from Early Bitcoin and Ethereum Investments; Anticipation Grows for His Upcoming Investment Decision - NewsBTC
content:
TLDR

Teenage millionaire Youssof Altoukhi seeks a fun yet unique crypto investment

Rebel Satoshi provides enticing financial rewards in a meme and rebellion-based platform

Youssof Altoukhi was only three years old when Bitcoin emerged in 2009. But thanks to this crypto and top DeFi projects like Ethereum, the Lebanese-born youngster is a millionaire.

As expected, Altoukhi understands what’s hip in the crypto world and is now focusing on meme altcoins to buy. Learn about his upcoming investment decision and how you can also get involved.

Youssof Altkoukhi: From Ordinary Teen To Crypto Millionaire

The entrepreneurial and investing bugs luckily bit Altkoukhi at the early stages of his adolescence. He explored crypto after the unprecedented 2017 bull run at the age of 13. While his friends focused on school, the would-be millionaire learned to become an expert in digital currencies.

While 2018 was a trying year, the youngster invested in several top crypto coins like Ethereum and Bitcoin. By 2021, Altkoukhi was featured in many media publications among the youngest crypto millionaires. This allowed him to launch his own crypto project, Y Coin, in the same year.

Y Coin is an intriguing governance coin with a game-changing democratic voting system. Altkoukhi also spends much of his time on social media platforms, boasting respectable followings on TikTok and X/Twitter.

Having succeeded with serious projects, the young man seeks something more fun while staying true to decentralization. The new Rebel Satoshi ($RBLZ) ticks these boxes and more.

Rebel Satoshi Offers Enticing Meme-Centric Financial Rewards

Rebel Satoshi is a new rebellion-branded meme coin combining defiance themes with interactive quests, community-building, and financial rewards. Satoshi Nakamoto and Guy Fawkes are the project’s mascots and examples of rebels who challenged the status quo.

Rebel Satoshi integrates their energies, encouraging community members to fight for decentralization, especially in the current financial system. The platform has an enticing ecosystem to reward daring rebels, with the $RBLZ token serving as the medium of exchange.

The Revolutionary Staking Hub is where users can stake their tokens, resulting in excellent returns and network security.

is where users can stake their tokens, resulting in excellent returns and network security. The Rebel Artefacts Vault will see two separate NFT collections of 9,999 special collectibles and digital art The latter consists of 6,831 Citizens, 2,000 Rebels, 999 Warriors, 150 Monarchs, and scarce 19 Recusants.

The $RBLZ token has a limited supply of 250 million, a stark contrast to other meme tokens. Rebel Satoshi designed these tokenomics to promote deflation and rarity.

Those who resonate with the project’s vision early can get exclusive rewards. The first includes induction into the Rebel Meme Hall of Fame, displaying their best rebel-motivated memes. Finally, they can receive insider project updates and sit at the governance table.

Before $RBLZ gets listed on multiple exchanges, Rebel Satoshi offers the token in a presale currently in the first or Early Bird Round. It’s trading for $0.010, an affordable price for many to have a sizeable holding. This is what buyers can expect following this event:

A 150% return as $RBLZ is set to be worth $0.025

Launch of a community rewards program

For the latest updates and more information, be sure to visit the official Rebel Satoshi Presale Website or contact Rebel Red via Telegram

title: Top 3 Price Prediction Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple: $40,000 in the cards for BTC as this bullish call executes - FXStreet
content:
Bitcoin price could run 5% north to test the $40,000 psychological level amid rising momentum and bullish RSI crossover.

Ethereum price coils up for a 5% move past the range high at $2,141 with the RSI mirroring Bitcoin momentum.

Ripple price eyes 10% gain to the supply barrier at $0.6582 but only if the $0.5981 support level holds.

Bitcoin (BTC) price is trading with a bullish bias, leading the broader market north with a price action characterized by higher highs. It points to growing volatility with forces such as the legal troubles of Binance and spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs) approvals chatter continuing to drive the market.

Ethereum (ETH) and Ripple (XRP) prices are also teasing with bullish biases, hinting at bullish moves depending on how the bulls play their hands.

Also Read: Bitcoin price gains might be sustainable with declining stablecoin dominance

Bitcoin could move north if RSI crossover is enough to go by

Bitcoin (BTC) price has breached the $38,008 resistance level, though not decisive just yet, to trade for $38,139 at the time of writing. There remains potential for a stretch to the range high at $38,414, or in a highly bullish case, a neck up to tag $40,000.

The Relative Strength Index (RSI) is moving north and is just about to cross above the signal line (yellow band). Historically, every time this crossover happens, BTC reacted with a bold move north, thereby qualifying the crossover as a buy signal.

In the same way, the Awesome Oscillator (AO) continues to hold in positive territory, showing that bulls still have control despite a strong bearish pull.

BTC/USDT 1-day chart

On the other hand, increased selling pressure could see Bitcoin price fall back below the $38,008 support, or worse, test the $35,487 support. In a more dire case, the slump could see BTC lose the support confluence between the horizontal line and the 50-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) at $33,912. A break and close below this level would invalidate the bullish thesis, setting the tone for an extension south to the $30,000 psychological level.

Also Read: Bitcoin’s bull trend in question as spot ETF momentum fades

Ethereum price eyes a 5% climb

Ethereum (ETH) price eyes a 5% climb to test the $2,141 range high before a possible correction, with the bullish breaker still holding as a support zone. The immediate support is at $2,029, atop which ETH continues to sit. Like in the case for Bitcoin, the RSI is about to cross above the signal line, hinting at a possible move north.

ETH/USDT 1-day chart

However, if sellers have their way, Ethereum price could fall into the supply zone turned bullish breaker, confirming the continuation of the move south by breaking and closing below the midline of this order block at $1,935.

The slump could extrapolate for Ethereum price to flip the bullish breaker back into a supply zone under the $1,864 support.

Also Read: Ethereum whale activity could pave way for ETH price to hit new yearly highs

Ripple price must hold above $0.5981 for 10% gain to play out

Ripple (XRP) is coiling up for a 10% move to the supply barrier stretching from $0.6582 to $0.7186, but it all depends on whether the $0.5981 support level holds. To confirm the uptrend, XRP must shatter the midline of the supply zone at $0.6857. In a highly bullish case, the $0.8000 psychological level could be tagged soon.

XRP/USDT 1-day chart

On the other hand, if the bears dominate, selling pressure could send XRP price below $0.5981, thereby invalidating the bullish thesis. In an extended move south, Ripple price could test the 50-day SMA at $0.5853, with prospects for more losses past the 200 and 100-day SMAs at $0.5531 and $0.5480, respectively.

Also Read: XRP price to pull north as Ripple beckons financial institutions to adopt XRPL XRP token.

title: Ethereum price may lose $2,000 level as ETH becomes deflationary again due to validator exit - FXStreet
content:
Ethereum price, trading at $2,038 on Tuesday, will likely fall below the crucial support level amid waning bullishness.

ETH validators, for the first time since Shapella's hard fork, have begun exiting to the tune of 1,018 per day.

ETH issuance has also taken a hit and, for the first time since December 2022, has recently had its growth rate decreased by 0.5% per day.

Ethereum price has been affected by the Shanghai hardfork since even before it was activated. But since the upgrade, this week marks the first instance when the market is witnessing the fear of unstaking come to life.

Ethereum price could take a bearish turn

Ethereum price has been hovering around the $2,000 mark since the beginning of the month. Trading at $2,038 at the time of writing, the second-generation cryptocurrency has failed to breach the resistance of $2,124 for the second time this month. While it did manage to break out of the downtrend over the past week, it is still vulnerable to a decline below the $2,000 support level.

The Relative Strength Index (RSI) is a measure of the speed and change of price movement. According to the indicator, there is still room for ETH to bounce back and reinitiate bullish momentum, given it is sitting above the neutral line at 50.0. The Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) indicator is also exhibiting the dominance of bearish momentum in the market presently, owing to the red bars on the histogram and the lack of a potential bullish crossover.

Thus, all the fingers point at a likely downtrend, which might see Ethereum price touching the lows of $1,900 or testing the support at $1,795.

ETH/USD 1-day chart

But if the broader market cues turn bullish and ETH bounces back from $2,000, it could make another attempt at breaching the resistance marked at $2,124. A rise through that level would invalidate the bearish thesis, opening ETH up to tagging $2,200.

Ethereum turns deflationary again

The chance of a bullish turn of events is both likely and unlikely. It's likely because ETH is deflationary once again. An asset being deflationary simply means that it no longer has an infinite supply but that it will reduce over time. This generally is a bullish event since low supply plus high demand equals a rise in price.

But the reason it could be unlikely in the case of Ethereum is that the conditions under which ETH is turning deflationary are unfavorable. According to blockchain analytics platform Glassnode, daily ETH issuance has experienced a slowdown. Over the last week, the growth rate of ETH issuance has slowed by up to 0.5% per day.

Ethereum daily issuance

This marks the first issuance decrease in nearly 12 months, and the reason behind it is the exit of validators. Unlike Bitcoin, Ethereum runs on the Proof of Stake consensus method, which requires node/block validators to stake ETH in order to qualify. Earlier, this staked ETH could not be withdrawn, but that feature was activated after the Shapella upgrade.

Since then, on average, 380 validators have exited on a daily basis. But this figure shot up by 168% in just a month, rising to 1,018 validators.

Ethereum validators

Consequently, the staked ETH has also noted a decline. The possibility of the validator exit could be due to one or more of these three possible reasons:

Investors are opting to change their staking setup, for example, by transferring stakes from CEXs (centralized exchanges) to Liquid Staking Providers (perhaps due to ongoing regulatory concerns).

Investors with access to US capital markets may be rotating capital toward safer assets, such as US treasuries, as interest rates remain elevated relative to ETH staking returns.

Investors may also be seeking greater liquidity for held ETH in anticipation of an imminent market uptrend rather than less liquid-staked ETH.

Nevertheless, this is not a good sign for Ethereum as the validators are the backbone of the network, and their exit could prove to be rather negative.

title: How To Earn Free Ethereum? A Step-by-Step Guide - CoinGape
content:
Key Takeaways Explore ways you can earn free Ethereum via simple methods like referrals and maximize your profits.

There are several risk-free options to get free ETH like crypto sign-up bonuses, referral rewards, crypto staking rewards, and airdrops.

Ethereum or ETH is one of the most popular cryptocurrencies to invest in the world. The coin is next to Bitcoin in terms of market capitalization, which depicts that the coin is wildly popular among crypto enthusiasts. Usually, one needs to shell out some cash to purchase Ethereum. However, there are several ways to score free Ethereum. In this guide, we will help you earn free Ethereum via simple methods and maximize your profits.

Earning Free Ethereum Crypto enthusiasts can earn free Ethereum in their crypto wallets by leveraging multiple methods. Here, we have curated trusted methods, like referrals, that are really simple and can be done numerous times to make a fortune.

5 Ways to Earn Free Ethereum There’s nothing better than getting free Ethereum. But as you know, nothing in the world comes for absolutely free. Even in the crypto world, you will need to complete small tasks to get free ETH in your crypto wallets. Here, we have shared step-by-step guides on popular ways of earning free ETH.

1. Step-by-Step Guide To Earn Free Ethereum Via Sign-up Bonuses Several crypto wallets and exchange platforms, like BuyUCoin or AQRU.io offer free Ethereum, on joining as crypto signup bonuses program. You can use these offers to get free Ethereum. Here’s how you can earn free Ethereum via sign-up bonuses: Step 1: Sign up on a crypto platform like BuyUCoin or AQRU.io. Step 2: Verify your email to activate your account. Step 3: Login and go to the promotions section. Step 4: Follow the instructions on the platform to get free Ethereum by only signing-up.

2. Step-by-Step Guide To Earn Free Ethereum Via Ethereum Staking Ethereum staking is one of the most popular methods of earning free Ethereum. However, in this method, one needs to already own at least 32 ETH to make more Ethereum by joining the staking pool. Here’s how you can earn free ETH by Ethereum Staking: Step 1: Firstly, you need to choose a secure crypto staking platform. Step 2: Log in or create an account on the selected staking platform. Step 3: Deposit your 32 ETH into the staking pool’s smart contract. Step 4: Follow platform instructions and start earning free ETH through Ethereum staking.

3. Step-by-Step Guide To Earn Free Ethereum Via Ethereum Trading Another popular method to earn free Ethereum is through trading Ethereum. Similar to Ethereum Staking, you need to have some Ethereum to start with Ethereum trading. You can choose any reliable crypto exchange platform for trading Ethereum and earn free ETH by going through the following steps: Step 1: Make sure that you have some ETH in your wallet that you will be using for trading ETH. Step 2: Choose a popular crypto exchange platform like Binance or Coinbase. Step 3: Log in or create and verify your account on the chosen exchange. Step 4: Deposit Ethereum into your exchange account. Step 5: Start ETH trading and try to make free ETH out of it. However, do note that trading of Ethereum could be risky and you can end up incurring losses if you don’t place your bets right. The method is usually opted for by seasoned crypto enthusiasts who can predict crypto movements.

4. Step-by-Step Guide To Earn Free Ethereum Via Referrals One of the simplest and easiest ways to make free Ethereum is through referrals. Several crypto platforms like crypto wallets or crypto exchanges offer free Ethereum or other crypto coins on successful referrals. Here’s how you can get free ETH through referrals: Step 1: Sign up on a crypto platform with a referral program. Step 2: Get your unique referral link from the platform’s referral program section. Step 3: Share the link with friends or on social media to get more users on the platform. Step 4: Earn free Ethereum when others sign up using your referral link. Step 5: Keep sharing and accumulating rewards through successful referrals.

5. Step by Step Guide To Earn Free Ethereum Via Claiming Airdrops Last but not least, you can get free Ethereum tokens by claiming airdrops. Several companies keep organizing Ethereum airdrops and you can participate in any of them to stand a chance of winning free Ethereum. Here’s how you can get free Ethereum via claiming airdrops:



Step 1: Stay informed about upcoming Ethereum airdrops by joining social media channels, forums, or new platforms where airdrop announcements are made. Step 2: Follow the instructions provided for each airdrop, which may include tasks like social media engagement or joining a crypto telegram group. Step 3: Submit the necessary information, such as your Ethereum wallet address, to receive the airdropped tokens. Step 4: Keep an eye on your wallet for the airdropped Ethereum tokens.

Conclusion Long story short, you can follow any of the methods mentioned above to get free Ethereum. These easy and simple methods will help you boost your overall Ethereum ownership as well as crypto wealth.
